products.title: Nobis Softshade Mid Grey Day And Night Blind
products.description: The nobis softshade mid grey day and night roller blind is a smart update for a modern space. With strips of grey fabric interspersed with strips of sheer voile, this versatile blind is a great way to make use of natural light in your home and has a sleek and contemporary look too. Product id: db-vrbx1870 fabric colour: mid grey material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white brackets control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er1 - lowest energy saving value - due to blind type or fabric light filtering: yes nobis softshade mid grey day and night blind in grey.

products.title: Nobis Softshade Charcoal Black Day And Night Blind
products.description: Make an impact on the look and feel of your living space with the nobis softshade charcoal black day and night roller blind. This super smart blind has a striking visual appeal and is a great way to make the most of natural light in your home. With horizontal stripes of dark fabric interspersed with sheer voile, you can retain a sense of privacy whilst allowing plenty of light to filter through. Product id: db-vrbx1869 fabric colour: charcoal black material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white brackets control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er1 - lowest energy saving value - due to blind type or fabric light filtering: yes nobis softshade charcoal black day and night blind in black.

products.title: Kanza Softshade Blackout Haze Grey Day And Night Blind
products.description: The kanza blackout softshade haze grey is a window covering with a difference. This smart design enables complete blackout when closed, or a practical alternative that is achieved with voile strips between the panels of grey blackout fabric, so you can enjoy a sense of privacy as well as a light and bright interior. Product id: db-vrbx1858 fabric colour: haze grey material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white brackets control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention blackout: yes kanza softshade blackout haze grey day and night blind in grey.

products.title: Hoxton Softshade Zinc Grey Day And Night Blind
products.description: Maintain a light and airy feel in your home with the hoxton softshade zinc grey day and night roller blind. Boasting an innovative design of alternating solid fabric and voile strip panels you can enjoy more versatility with your window covering. This design allows for privacy with plenty of natural light, or you can close the blind completely for more shade. The stony grey hue is ideal for blending with cool modern schemes.

products.title: Hoxton Softshade Silver Grey Day And Night Blind
products.description: Make a stylish and practical interior update with the hoxton softshade silver grey day and night roller blind. The design of alternating grey fabric and voile strip panels creates visual impact that will look really smart within a contemporary interior, whilst at the same time this day and night roller blind provides privacy with plenty of natural light so you can maintain a light and bright ambience.

products.title: Galileo Faux Silk Silver Roman Blind
products.description: A roman blind is often considered a more traditional choice for window dressing, but this chic little blind proves just how modern and stylish they can be too. The base fabric is a crisp silver faux silk, shimmering and metallic in its finish, softened with the whorls and slub a roman blind is often considered a more traditional choice for window dressing, but this chic little blind proves just how modern and stylish they can be too.

products.title: Bella Blackout Mid Grey Panel Blind
products.description: Their bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. Loved by their customers for its simplicity and value for money, their bella blackout fabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. This mid-grey panel blind blends perfectly with any style or taste, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories.

products.title: Bella Blackout Grey Panel Blind
products.description: Their bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finishand colour match blockout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This grey panel blind is bang on trend so will look great in any room and is also made from blackout fabric,to help blockout the light when desired. products.title: Bella Blackout Pebble Grey Panel Blind
products.description: Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This pebble grey panel blind freshens up any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure panelblind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

products.title: Eco Friendly Fr Grey Panel Blind
products.description: Their eco-friendly, recycled panel blinds are made from 100% pet recycled waste. This means that you can decorate your window with your new sustainable blind, and contribute positively to the environment. For every sq. Metre of fabric, 9 pet bottles are used, so you'll be positively contributing to the fight on plastic pollution, as well as getting a stylish blind. Made with a moisture-resistant and flame-retardant coating, your new grey panel blind can be just the thing to complete your bathroom or kitchen.
